name: YHUK™ BH FFP2 protective mask

overview.title: YHUK™ BH FFP2 protective mask
overview.text: YHUK™ BH FFP2 protective mask  Effectively filter suspended particles or germs.New nanofibrous film has better filter efficiency and be more comfortable than traditional materials. Conform to en 149:2001+A1:2009

specifications.value:
Main Body: Meltdown and nonwoven fabrics nanofibrous film
Head-straps: Elastane cord

Standard EU: EN 149:2001+A1:2009 FFP2
DIN ISO 13485:2016

productDetail:
YHUK™ BH FFP2 protective mask

Filtration Efficiency : ≥ 97%
Inhalation resistance <=350Pa
Exhalation resistance<=250Pa
Dead space <=1%
Vision >= 10N
The product conforms to EN 149 FFP2. It is certified by 'DEKRA'.
The factory is certified by China National Medical Products Administration (NMPA) and it is on the white list of non-medical mask of China Chamber Of Commerce Of Medicine & Health Produces Importers & Exporters.
